title: NIPER Raebareli Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Assistant Registrar, Assistant Grade-II and Other Posts
description: The National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research, Raebareli (NIPER Raebareli) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Assistant Registrar, Administrative Officer, and Assistant Grade-II Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, and M.E./M. Tech can apply for the NIPER Raebareli Recruitment 2025. The interested app...
